name: waqup-app
description: waQup multi-platform application - Mobile (React Native + Expo for Android/iOS) and Web (Next.js for desktop browsers)

scripts.dev:all: npm run dev:mobile & npm run dev:web
scripts.dev:all:clean: rm -f packages/web/.next/dev/lock 2>/dev/null; (lsof -ti:3000 2>/dev/null|xargs kill -9) || true; (lsof -ti:8081 2>/dev/null|xargs kill -9) || true; npm run dev:all
scripts.dev:all:win: npm run dev:mobile & npm run dev:web
scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build:mobile && npm run build:web

author: InnerFlect Tech
